location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from J. Elphinston, Accountant General at Bombay Castle, to W. Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from J. Elphinston, Accountant General at Bombay Castle, to W. Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, enclosing a letter received on 8 December from F. Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, regarding extra disbursement in the Persian Gulf to be paid by the Presidency of Bengal.
